original_text:
And they made his grave with the wicked
    and with a rich man in his death,
although he had done no violence,
    and there was no deceit in his mouth.
korean_text: 그는 강포를 행하지 아니하였고 그의 입에 거짓이 없었으나 그의 무덤이 악인들과 함께 있었으며 그가 죽은 후에 부자와 함께 있었도다

sentences.original_text: And they made his grave with the wicked
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그의 무덤을 악인들과 함께 만들었고

sentences.original_text: and with a rich man in his death
although he had done no violence
and there was no deceit in his mouth.
